document_title: Lupus nephritis: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, prevention
subsection_content: Early diagnosis and treatment will help prevent lupus nephritis from getting worse and avoid emergency situations. Therefore, patients should quickly go to reputable medical facilities for examination, diagnosis and early intervention measures to prevent dangerous complications.
subsection_title: viem than lupus.json. When to see a doctor?

viem than lupus.json. When to see a doctor?
Early diagnosis and treatment will help prevent lupus nephritis from getting worse and avoid emergency situations. Therefore, patients should quickly go to reputable medical facilities for examination, diagnosis and early intervention measures to prevent dangerous complications.
